Title:
Peeled Tree
Description:
Example multiple. A cross section of a peeled tree from the Payette National Forest. The inner bark was utilized as a food resource by Indigenous Tribe.
Subjects:
Peeled Tree Payette National Forest Indigenous Tribe
Type:
record
Format:
image/jpeg
Language:
eng
Source
